item.title: Advancing Your R
item.description: Getting here The course is taking place in the Waterhouse Room at the Foresight Centre, University of Liverpool. Road From the M62 (end of motorway 3 miles) From the M53( Wirral/Mersey Tunnels 3⁄4 mile) Please use L3 5DA for sat nav Rail Liverpool Lime St Station is a 10 minute walk. For local public transport please contact Merseytravel Air Liverpool John Lennon Airport is 7 Miles away from the Foresight Centre.
